verses.roman:
"ei raghunāthe āmi saṅpinu tomāre
putra-bhṛtya-rūpe tumi kara aṅgīkāre

synonyms: ei raghunāthe—this Raghunātha dāsa; āmi—I; saṅpinu tomāre—am entrusting to you; putra—son; bhṛtya—servant; rūpe—as; tumi—you (Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī); kara aṅgīkāre—please accept.
translation: "My dear Svarūpa," He said, "I entrust this Raghunātha dāsa to you. Please accept him as your son or servant.
